mapper.select: select so.seckill_id, so.user_phone, so.create_time, so.money, so.state, s.create_time "seckill.createTime", s.end_time "endTime", s.seckill_id "seckill.seckillId", s.cost_price "costPrice", s.price "price", s.image "image", s.title "title", s.start_time "startTime" from seckill s inner join seckill_order so on so.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where so.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
